fields.name: IOM - International Organization for Migration
fields.description: IOM's Displacement Tracking Matrix (DTM) provides data on internal displacement in Sudan, including IDP numbers at admin level 2.
fields.comment: Requires IOM_API_KEY and IOM_APP environment variables for API authentication

fields.name: ACLED
fields.description: Conflict monitoring providing real-time data and analysis on violent conflict and protest.

fields.name: IDMC-GIDD - Global Internal Displacement Database
fields.description: IDMC Global Internal Displacement Database - Annual displacement data by location and cause
fields.comment: GIDD endpoint - single API call for all displacement variables (conflict, disaster, total)

fields.name: IDMC-IDU - Internal Displacement Updates
fields.description: IDMC Internal Displacement Updates - Real-time displacement events and updates
fields.comment: IDU endpoint - single API call for all displacement event variables (new, conflict, disaster)

fields.name: Dataminr
fields.description: Dataminr FirstAlert API - Real-time alerts and early warning signals from social media and public information sources
fields.comment: Requires DATAMINR_USERNAME and DATAMINR_API_KEY environment variables

fields.name: FEWSNET - Famine Early Warning Systems Network
fields.description: FEWSNET provides food security data through IPC (Integrated Food Security Phase Classification) shapefiles. Performs spatial overlay with ADM2 boundaries to calculate area-weighted food insecurity indicators.
fields.comment: Downloads monthly shapefiles (ML1) for food insecurity classification. No authentication required.

fields.name: ACLED CAST - Conflict Alert System Tool
fields.description: ACLED CAST provides forecasted conflict event data aggregated at the state-month level. Includes predictions for battles, explosions/remote violence, and violence against civilians.
fields.comment: Requires ACLED_USERNAME and ACLED_API_KEY environment variables for OAuth authentication. Data provided at state level (ADM1) with location matching to local admin boundaries.

fields.name: GloFAS - Global Flood Awareness System
fields.description: GloFAS Rapid Flood Mapping provides daily flood extent shapefiles from Copernicus Emergency Management Service. Downloads flood extents, overlays with ADM2 boundaries, and calculates affected population using GHSL population data.
fields.comment: Public API (no authentication required). Based on 90m resolution flood inundation maps from LISFLOOD-FP hydraulic modeling. Covers riverine flooding for rivers >500 kmÂ² upstream area. Does not include pluvial or coastal flooding.
